name: 24x7 Learning Private
overview:
24x7 Learning Private Limited, an e-learning implementations company, delivers enterprise and academic learning solutions. Its products include 24x7 LearnTrak, an enterprise intellectual capital management platform, which helps in managing formal, informal, offline, and online learning; 24x7 InterAct, a communication and collaboration software designed to enable individuals to communicate via the Internet; CAN-8 VirtuaLab, a digital language laboratory, which offers network based, interactive, and multimedia learning facility with the ability to teach and test languages; and Articulate Presenter, a desktop solution, which has the tools required to create engaging flash based e-learning content. The company also offers Referenceware, which delivers collections of reference content in a searchable and Web-based environment. In addition, it offers consulting, implementation, and managed services ranging from applications to business processes to infrastructure. The company offers its products and services to various industries, including information technology, business process outsourcing, telecom, retail and consumer products, financial services, and healthcare, as well as to the government.

The company was formerly known as 24Ã—7 Learning Solutions Private Limited. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Bangalore, India with additional offices in Mumbai, Delhi, Kolkata, Chennai, and Hyderabad, India.

funding_rounds.source_description: 24x7 Learning secures strategic investment from Capital18
